title: New: Cloud Boat – Youthern
body:
_Book Of Hours_ is the name of **Cloud Boats**‘ new album, due out on R&S inprint **Apollo,** early next month.

We’ve been gifted a new track from the album in the form of this minimal yet supremely eloquent cut, _Youthern._ We’ve seen a remarkable shift in the duos writing focus in the lead up to the album, **Cloud Boat** now seem to be completely focused on writing ‘songs’, and frankly they’re infinitely better for it.
